org.digijava.kernel.request

Class RequestProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.struts.action.RequestProcessor
      • org.apache.struts.tiles.TilesRequestProcessor
        • org.digijava.kernel.request.RequestProcessor

  • public class RequestProcessor
extends org.apache.struts.tiles.TilesRequestProcessor
    This class works as Struts request processor Struts invokes first processPath() and then processMap()
